data.text: @flymoro @BLQairport Gentile Moreno, ci scusiamo molto per il disagio causato. Per poter darLe riscontro, potrebbe gentilmente inviarci via messaggio privato, trattandosi di dati sensibili, num del volo, giorno e nume di pratica di bagaglio smarrito? In attesa di riscontro. Cordiali Saluti/Laure

If you're strolling through #Verona at sunset, our #Storyteller recommends the breathtaking view from 84 metres up the Lamberti Tower, which offers a superb panorama and can be visited all year round: https://t.co/41o5T8TSgo. 
#AirDolomiti #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/wAg5XKTJau

Discover the city of Romeo and Juliet by William Shakespeare, and the second home of the Supreme Poet, Dante! You'll find this and much more in our video devoted to the enigmatic and fascinating city of #Verona. 🎬 https://t.co/SN2BP66W6p #AlternativeGuide #AirDolomiti
@CescaFay Happy to read that! We wish you a great flight ✈️☺️

data.text: This month #AlternativeGuide features the beautiful and mysterious #Verona. Among the most evocative locations you'll find the “Scaliger tombs”, a monumental funerary complex in Gothic style of the ancient Lords of Verona. #AirDolomiti https://t.co/zSr6gwS5ua https://t.co/406G0Tvt9L
@lukiebriner Dear Luke, thank you very much for your kind Feedback. If you wish you can send us your flight details through DM and we will forward it to the dpt in charge ☺️
RT @tgtourism: I sapori emiliani protagonisti dei #voli #AirDolomiti https://t.co/DhZhkh41d7 https://t.co/BdAEFUkmbs

An essential stop-off in #Venice for anyone who loves reading is the Acqua Alta bookshop, where all the books are displayed displayed in boats, canoes, gondolas and bathtubs. A marvel not to be missed! https://t.co/wNfcfBHFph #AlternativeGuide #AirDolomiti

data.text: @Carfield76 Dear Mr Leung, thank you very much for reaching out. We are aware that you are already in touch with our Customer Relations Dpt. We kindly ask you to contact them directly for any update concerning your luggage. BR/Laure
@Carfield76 Dear Mr Leung, thank you very much for your details. We will check with the department in charge for your luggage. BR/Laure

@Carfield76 Our service is built around our customers, you are always top priority 😊should you wish to share your flight number and date with us, we will forward to the departments in charge your kind tweet. BR/Laure

data.text: @micmol Awesome shot! Would you be so kind to send it socialmediateam@airdolomiti.it and let us share it on our social profiles?

Thanks for sending us your flight details. Yet, as your request is being processed by a colleague of mine, I kindly ask you to refer to her for any further info. She'll be back to you as soon as possible. BR/Michaela https://t.co/MfSL42rMW1

Thank you so much @irenelevine for your positive review! What a pity you didn't get to try our new in-flight entertainment system: https://t.co/8TRJRtEIPA. Next time! We wish you a nice stay in Puglia and look forward to welcoming you on board soon again! 😊 https://t.co/EVXMlrl6EZ
@asphodelia Hi Paola, thanks for contacting us here. Could you please send us more info via DM so we can check if it has been received and processed yet? BR/Michaela

If you have a passion for #Italy and you literally want to get our hands on it, pop by our stand 410, hall B5! Immerse yourself in the Italian culture! 🇮🇹️
#freemesse #munich #airdolomiti #cookingshow #dolcevita #schrannenhalle #eatbetterlivebetter #muenchen https://t.co/VsqrEHty3E

@rzierhofer @Lufthansa_DE versucht man die Flüge durchzuführen und somit den reguläreren Transport zu versichern. Dies war an diesem Tag auf Grunde des Schneefalls nicht möglich. Wir bitten um Verständnis und Entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten noch einmalst. MFG/ Laure
